review_data.title: A must-visit
review_data.content: Awesome cocktails and good (local) beers. Amazing bartender. Super professional cocktails. Also one of the best rum selections I know.

review_data.title: Gute Bar

review_data.title: Gemütliche Bar
review_data.content: Gute Drinks, lecker Bier und auch köstlichen Tee wird hier einem angeboten. Lohnenswert für einen gemütlichen Abend!

review_data.title: Perfect mellow mood
review_data.content: That's kind of a bar where you can sit with friends and relax. Great choice of drinks, relaxing not too loud music, not pretentious.

review_data.title: One of my absolute Zurich favorite bars
review_data.content: This bar has it all for me: unpretentions but perfect service. Laided back but professionell. Great drinks and an amazing spirits selection. Super cool and friendly staff and very nice zurich guests. Just a step around the corner of this crazy Langstrasse - this is...More

review_data.title: Unkompliziert, vielseitig, am Zahn der Zeit
review_data.content: Anschauungsbeispiel einer Bar mit guter Durchmischtheit. Vom Biertrinker über Teenie-Rauschtrinker bis zum Whiskynerd ist alles vorhanden. Sympatische Bedienung mit Ahnung...More

review_data.title: Cosy bar to call into
review_data.content: We liked the fact that Bar 63 is away from the centre city. More of a local with good music, a comfortable ambience and a range of drinks. It was a cold evening when we called. We sat at the bar and enjoyed a drink.

review_data.title: Neighbourhood pub - Swiss style
review_data.content: What I like about Bar 63 is that it is nestled in the Kreis 4 quarter of the Zürich. This area used to be the home to life on the seedier side of the city. But that is now all gone now (not sure if...More

review_data.title: A popular trendy bar
review_data.content: They feature a LARGE SELECTION OF FINE RUMS from all over the world. That's their specialty. It's a hipster crowd, 20-35, very nice owner.

review_data.title: Great style
review_data.content: I loved the style of the bar. We chose it since our home was behind the corner and have not been disappointed. The bar was crowded but we managed to find a place and took very good drinks. It definitely worth it to stop and...More

review_data.title: Always a good time!
review_data.content: The Bar 63 is located on a side street next to the legendary langstrasse. It is small but super comfortable. They have a wide array of craft and speciality beers and a great choice of spirits. The real USP: their great choice of cocktails which...More

review_data.title: small and nice
review_data.content: Small and full of people but with a good beer choice. Typical bar atmosphere, you will enjoy. Friendly staff

review_data.title: A nice bar off Langstrasse
review_data.content: Bar 63 is located off Langstrasse and has an L-shaped bar with plenty of stools, padded seats and tables. They have beer on tap, bottles, wine, spirits and cocktails. The friendly female staff person was very helpful. The place seems to be a nice hang-out....More
